_meta.source: Researched from Antigua tourism, Nelson's Dockyard, and cruise port guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers St. John's, English Harbour, Nelson's Dockyard

transit_routes.name: Bus #17 to English Harbour
transit_routes.note: Most popular route for cruise passengers. Departs from bus station.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Nelson's Dockyard
transit_routes.note: Faster and more comfortable than bus. Can share with other passengers.

featured_experiences.name: Nelson's Dockyard
featured_experiences.note: World's only continuously working Georgian-era dockyard. Entry ~$8.

featured_experiences.name: Shirley Heights Lookout
featured_experiences.note: Spectacular views over English Harbour. Sunday afternoon party is legendary.

featured_experiences.name: Dickenson Bay
featured_experiences.note: Island's most popular beach. 10 min from port. Chair rentals available.
